name: Alchemical Apprentice
description: A small, amorphous ooze that exhibits a blend of alchemical talent and resilience, absorbing and utilizing various potions and oils.
memorable: Its ability to absorb potions and nullify their effects while being vulnerable to sunlight makes it unique and strategic in encounters.
goals: Typically seeks to utilize alchemical substances and navigate its surroundings effectively.
relations: May be associated with alchemists or oozes in general.
environment: Commonly found in laboratories or places with a strong focus on alchemy.
strengths: Resistant to acid, cold, fire, and poison damage and immune to many conditions.
weaknesses: Extremely vulnerable to direct sunlight exposure and struggles in prolonged movement away from its origin.
attacks: Can attack with a pseudopod for bludgeoning damage and use a magical burble attack inflicting adaptable damage types.
most_powerful_ability: The Absorb Potion ability allows it to strategically nullify any alchemical substance it encounters.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to navigate its environment without relying on vision.
skills: Proficient in Arcana with a +5 modifier, showcasing its strong understanding of magical principles.
additional_information: Amorphous trait allows squeezing through tight spaces.
Can produce a common potion, oil, tincture, or alchemical draught once per day.
Condition immunities provide consistent operational advantages.
test_queries: creature with blindsight and alchemical skills
